citations.narrative:
The licensee is conducting regulated activity at unapproved sites. The licensee stated that she has 2 breeding pairs of
marmoset and 1 breeding pair of ring-tailed lemurs at her property in Florida. These animals are paired up for breeding,
and the lemurs recently had an infant. The licensee also owns 2 infant caracal cats that are currently housed at a property
in Alabama. The properties in Florida and Alabama have not been inspected and approved for regulated activity by USDA
officials. The licensee has repeatedly been informed by USDA officials that no regulated activity may occur at unapproved
locations. Inspection and approval of locations (sites) where animals are housed is essential for ensuring animal welfare
and compliance with the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) regulations. Correct by only conducting regulated activity (including
breeding, selling, and exhibiting AWA-covered animals) at sites/locations that have been inspected and approved by
USDA officials.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee is conducting regulated activity at unapproved sites. The licensee stated that she has 2 breeding pairs of 
marmoset and 1 breeding pair of ring-tailed lemurs at her property in Florida. These animals are paired up for breeding, 
and the lemurs recently had an infant. The licensee also owns 2 infant caracal cats that are currently housed at a property 
in Alabama. The properties in Florida and Alabama have not been inspected and approved for regulated activity by USDA 
officials. The licensee has repeatedly been informed by USDA officials that no regulated activity may occur at unapproved 
locations. Inspection and approval of locations (sites) where animals are housed is essential for ensuring animal welfare 
and compliance with the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) regulations. Correct by only conducting regulated activity (including 
breeding, selling, and exhibiting AWA-covered animals) at sites/locations that have been inspected and approved by 
USDA officials. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
